程序包 com.pi.pano

类 PilotSDK

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pi.pano.PilotSDK
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    PanoSurfaceViewListener
    public class PilotSDK
extends java.lang.Object
implements PanoSurfaceViewListener
    Panorama related SDK, can be used for panorama expansion, stitching, preview, photo, set video live interface, insert mp4 panorama information, etc.

        public PilotSDK​(android.view.ViewGroup parentView,
                PanoSDKListener panoSDKListener)
        Instantiate PanoSDK when Activity onCreate
        参数:
        parentView - PanoSDK contains a PreviewView, which is the parent view of the PreviewView.
        panoSDKListener - Callback interface of PanoSDK

        参数:
        context - context

      • isDestroy

        public static boolean isDestroy()

      • setLensCorrectionMode

        public static void setLensCorrectionMode​(int mode)
        Set lens distortion correction mode. Generally set to 0x1111, which means that all four lenses are corrected for spherical rectangular projection mode distortion; If set to 0x3333, it means that all four lenses are arranged horizontally according to the fisheye mode aberration correction; If set to 0x5555, it means that all four lenses are corrected by fisheye mode aberration, field grid arrangement.
        参数:
        mode - 0x1-Spherical rectangular projection mode 0x3-Fisheye mode 0x9-vlog mode.

      • getPreviewParam

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getPreviewParam()

                                   IPreviewParamListener listener)

      • setStitchingDistance

        public static void setStitchingDistance​(float distance,
                                        float max)
        Set stitch distance
        参数:
        distance - -100~100 0 represents the distance during calibration, about 2m; 100 represents infinity; - 100 is about 0.5m.
        max - max distance value

      • setPreviewMode

        public static void setPreviewMode​(int mode,
                                  float rotateDegree,
                                  boolean playAnimation,
                                  float fov,
                                  float cameraDistance)
        Set preview mode.
        参数:
        mode - PiPreviewMode
        rotateDegree - 0~360 Initial rotation angle, horizontal rotation in plane mode, and rotation around Y axis in spherical mode.
        playAnimation - Whether to play the switching animation when switching the display mode.
        fov - 0~180 Initial longitudinal fov.
        cameraDistance - 0~400 Distance from camera to ball center.

      • setEnableTouchEvent

        public static void setEnableTouchEvent​(boolean b)
        Whether to enable/disable touch events
        参数:
        b - true: turn on; false:turn off

      • makePanoWithMultiFisheye

        public static int makePanoWithMultiFisheye​(@NonNull
                                           java.lang.String unstitchFilename,
                                           java.lang.String[] fisheyeFilenames,
                                           int mask)
        Combine multiple fisheye images into one fisheye image and expand the stitching, used to remove the silhouette or split photos.
        参数:
        unstitchFilename - unstitch file path
        fisheyeFilenames - A set of fisheye charts for merging
        mask - The mask of the merging method, such as 0x0112, indicates the four fisheyes of the merged fisheye image, from the left to the right fisheyes are from fisheyeFilenames 0, 1, 2, 2.
        返回:
        0:no error

      • makeSlamPhotoPoint

        public static void makeSlamPhotoPoint​(java.lang.String filename)
        Marking points in slam.
        参数:
        filename - file name

      • injectThumbnail

        public static int injectThumbnail​(java.lang.String jpegFilename,
                                  java.lang.String thumbFilename)
        Add thumbnails to the jpeg file, the size of the thumbnails should not exceed 60000 bytes, if the original jpeg file has thumbnails, then replace it.
        参数:
        jpegFilename - To add thumbnails to a jpeg file.
        thumbFilename - The thumbnail file to be added or replaced, in jpeg format, cannot exceed 60,000 bytes.
        返回:
        0:no error

      • startRecord

        public static int startRecord​(java.lang.String dirPath,
                              java.lang.String filename,
                              java.lang.String encode,
                              int videoWidth,
                              int videoHeight,
                              int fps,
                              int channelCount,
                              boolean useForGoogleMap,
                              int memomotionRatio,
                              int bitRate,
                              MediaRecorderListener listener,
                              IAudioEncoderExt audioEncoderExt,
                              IAudioRecordExt audioRecordExt)
        Start recording.
        参数:
        dirPath - Storage Folder
        filename - file name
        encode - encode
        videoWidth - video width
        videoHeight - video height
        fps - video fps
        channelCount - audio channel count
        useForGoogleMap - Real-time stitching whether it is used for google map, this value for fisheye mp4 is not meaningful.
        memomotionRatio - Time-lapse photography multiplier, if the current is 7fps, if the ratio is 70, then the frame will be reduced to 7/70 = 0.1fps, that is, 10s to record a frame, only effective for real-time splicing video.
        bitRate - bit rate
        audioEncoderExt - audio attachment encoder
        返回:
        0:no error

      • setStabilizationTimeOffset

        public static void setStabilizationTimeOffset​(long timestampOffset,
                                              long rollingShutterDuration)
        Timestamp offset between camera image and gyroscope.
        参数:
        timestampOffset - Timestamp offset in nanoseconds, recommended range 5000000 to 25000000.
        rollingShutterDuration - Half the time of the roll-up shutter from the first line to the last line.

      • setLocationInfo

        public static void setLocationInfo​(android.location.Location location)
        Set gps information,gps information will be used to write video.

      • setEncodeInputSurfaceForVideo

        public static void setEncodeInputSurfaceForVideo​(android.view.Surface encodeInputSurface)
        Set the encoding surface for recording. This surface is generally from MediaRecorder. getSurface() or MediaCodec. createInputSurface(). The SDK will render graphics on this surface and encode them by MediaRecorder or MediaCodec.
        参数:
        encodeInputSurface - Generally from MediaRecorder. getSurface() or MediaCodec. createInputSurface().

      • setEncodeInputSurfaceForLive

        public static void setEncodeInputSurfaceForLive​(android.view.Surface encodeInputSurface)

      • stabSetLockAxis

        public static void stabSetLockAxis​(boolean yaw,
                                   boolean pitch,
                                   boolean roll,
                                   float lerp)
        Whether to lock the axis when turning on the rotation lock.
        参数:
        yaw - whether to lock yaw
        pitch - whether to lock pitch
        roll - whether to lock roll
        lerp - 00~1 When an axis is not followed, this value represents the tightness coefficient of the lens, and the greater the value, the faster the following.

      • setUpsideDown

        public static void setUpsideDown​(boolean b)
        Set the handstand status. If anti shake is enabled, the handstand effect is invalid.
        参数:
        b - true: handstand

      • setSlamEnable

        public static void setSlamEnable​(boolean enable,
                                 float lenForCalMeasuringScale,
                                 boolean useForImuToPanoRotation,
                                 SlamListener listener)
        Set the slam switch
        参数:
        enable - Whether to turn on/off slam
        lenForCalMeasuringScale - Distance used to calculate the scale
        listener - listener

      • setParamReCaliEnable

        public static void setParamReCaliEnable​(int executionInterval,
                                        boolean effectiveImmediately)
        Enable or disable the recalculation of parameters.
        参数:
        executionInterval - >0 calculated splicing interval 0 closed calculation<0 calculated once.
        effectiveImmediately - true: it takes effect immediately after calculation, which is used to save performance in live broadcast; false: it takes effect gradually after calculation, and the splicing distance changes smoothly.

        true: google street view video
